Text in lead stand-out and is great for highlighting.


I am a very bold text from the b tag

I am a very underlined cause i have a class of .text-underline

I am a very small text from the small tag

I am a link

Thank you all for comming

Images

All images are responsive by default.

Grid

Grid system consist 12 columns - columns count are defined via variables which allow you to change after your needs.


Columns for mobile devices
